title: Solve message play in production issue
description:
When building the vibe cast app in production, triggering messages does not show. It works well in development mode.

This is quite likely because of the difference in how the visualization window is opened in production, where it is re-started in order to make a fix for youtbue playback. Note, youtbue playback should still be working without error 153 in production builds

As a part of this work, a comprehensive testing strategy needs to be developed, so it is possible to test without a human in the loop.

title: Test messages in production
description: There needs to be a way to automatically test is messages are shown for the production build of the app

title: Debug information for production
description: When running in production mode, it should be possible to get debug information. The current overlay (cmd+shift+d) does not show up. This might be the same issue as the messages now showing

title: Make sure messages show in production
description: Messages should show in production when triggered. Currently they only show as playing but nothing happens.

title: Use Tauri bundling
description: Current bundling for mac os uses a shell script. Clean this up to use Tauri-standard bundling
